医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新技术提供了细胞控制中心内部前所未有的视图细胞核被认为是重要细胞过程的控制中心，但其材料特性仍然困扰着科学家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/New-technique-provides-an-unprecedented-view-inside-the-cells-control-center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/New-technique-provides-an-unprecedented-view-inside-the-cells-control-center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b900a8c9-4743-408c-a8ad-ab111a65cfb6 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 09:08:24 -0500 New technique provides an unprecedented view inside the cell's control center
年龄、种族和贫困与英国较低的 COVID-19 疫苗接种率有关SARS-CoV-2 疫苗接种不足与 COVID-19 结果之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Age-ethnicity-and-deprivation-linked-to-lower-COVID-19-vaccination-rates-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Age-ethnicity-and-deprivation-linked-to-lower-COVID-19-vaccination-rates-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80a261a3-c870-4443-9293-a0a9bf722fef Thu, 18 Jan 2024 09:04:00 -0500 Age, ethnicity, and deprivation linked to lower COVID-19 vaccination rates in the UK
玩预防：预防社区老年人跌倒的视频游戏研究人员评估了与对照组相比，家庭认知和运动游戏步骤训练干预措施在预防社区老年人跌倒方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Play-to-prevent-Video-games-for-preventing-falls-in-community-dwelling-older-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Play-to-prevent-Video-games-for-preventing-falls-in-community-dwelling-older-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4450f70f-3a4e-4b5a-b994-41b0947384fe Thu, 18 Jan 2024 08:56:00 -0500 Play to prevent: Video games for preventing falls in community-dwelling older people
葡萄糖诱导两性霉素 B 耐受治疗真菌性脑膜炎的作用研究人员调查了新型隐球菌对两性霉素 B 耐受的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/The-role-of-glucose-in-inducing-tolerance-to-amphotericin-B-for-fungal-meningitis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/The-role-of-glucose-in-inducing-tolerance-to-amphotericin-B-for-fungal-meningitis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6abca799-f187-418d-85a3-664af79faaf8 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 08:19:00 -0500 The role of glucose in inducing tolerance to amphotericin B for fungal meningitis treatment
数学模型证明联合药物疗法对乳腺癌治疗的功效研究人员使用数学模型来评估 AZD9496 和 palbociclib 的新联合疗法治疗乳腺癌的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Mathetatical-modeling-demonstrates-efficacy-of-combinational-drug-therapy-for-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Mathetatical-modeling-demonstrates-efficacy-of-combinational-drug-therapy-for-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3eb4c37-c9e4-471d-9617-95954ad20b24 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 08:14:00 -0500 Mathetatical modeling demonstrates efficacy of combinational drug therapy for breast cancer treatment
无论是否“紧急”，新冠病毒仍在夺走人们的生命。以下是医生建议保持安全的建议。自 10 月初以来，美国已有约 2 万人死于新冠病毒，国外还有数万人死于新冠病毒，新冠病毒大流行显然还没有结束。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/e28098Emergencye28099-or-not-covid-is-still-killing-people-Heree28099s-what-doctors-advise-to-stay-safe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/e28098Emergencye28099-or-not-covid-is-still-killing-people-Heree28099s-what-doctors-advise-to-stay-safe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa0f8284-9253-4366-b80d-681131e2b88e Thu, 18 Jan 2024 06:00:35 -0500 ‘Emergency’ or not, covid is still killing people. Here’s what doctors advise to stay safe.
女性和少数族裔首当其冲地遭受医疗误诊查丽蒂·沃特金斯 (Charity Watkins) 在女儿出生后感到精疲力尽，她意识到有些事情严重不对劲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Women-and-minorities-bear-the-brunt-of-medical-misdiagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Women-and-minorities-bear-the-brunt-of-medical-misdiagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30962094-9124-49ab-a991-896276be4281 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 05:40:14 -0500 Women and minorities bear the brunt of medical misdiagnosis
新的生物工程策略显示出治疗溃疡性结肠炎的潜力通过利用癌细胞逃避免疫攻击的机制，德克萨斯大学西南医学中心的研究人员在动物模型中开发了一种新策略，该策略具有治疗溃疡性结肠炎的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/New-bioengineered-strategy-shows-potial-for-treating-ulcerative-colitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/New-bioengineered-strategy-shows-potential-for-treating-ulcerative-colitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5347be8e-bd5e-4952-b3b3-09fe0394f74c Wed, 17 Jan 2024 22:51:00 -0500 New bioengineered strategy shows potential for treating ulcerative colitis
强迫症患者因自然和非自然原因死亡的风险可能更高《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项来自瑞典的研究发现，患有强迫症 (OCD) 的人因自然和非自然原因死亡的风险可能比未患强迫症的人更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/OCD-病人-may-have-higher-risk-of-death-from-both-natural-and-unnatural-causes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/OCD-病人-may-have-higher-risk-of-death-from-both-natural-and-unnatural-causes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbf5bce3-0a48-4db2-ab06-757aed9a0c3e Wed, 17 Jan 2024 22:46:19 -0500 OCD patients may have higher risk of death from both natural and unnatural causes
基因分型技术加速新冠病毒变异识别根据东安格利亚大学和英国卫生安全局的研究，基因分型技术比以往任何时候都更快、更便宜地检测新冠病毒变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Genotyping-technology-speeds-up-Covid-variant-identification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Genotyping-technology-speeds-up-Covid-variant-identification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08a2a519-6e5d-4526-aa19-ffb740a9635c Wed, 17 Jan 2024 22:41:00 -0500 Genotyping technology speeds up Covid variant identification
